hero.headline: AI works
hero.headlineAccent: when you start from the right problem.
hero.subtitleLine1: We find where your business loses time or money.
hero.subtitleLine2: Then we build the tool that fixes it.
hero.microCopy: No automated quotes. Just the right diagnosis.

brandShowcase.label: Our approach
brandShowcase.tagline: What we build, works every day.
brandShowcase.subtitle: The hard part isn't building. It's knowing what to build.

about.label: About Us
about.title: About
about.intro: The AI and Beyond was born from Leonardo Sarti Magi's experience: an AI consultant and software developer with a direct approach to solving real problems.
about.paragraph1: The AI and Beyond is a lean structure where human expertise and AI tools work together on every project. No departments, no bureaucracy — just the right people and tools for the problem at hand.
about.paragraph2: When you work with us, you're not working with a freelancer doing everything alone. You're working with a system where every analysis, every automation, every deliverable goes through AI tools that we ourselves use every day. It's our way of proving AI works: we use it before recommending it.
about.paragraph3: Our starting point is always the same: where are you losing time, money, or control over a process? From there, we figure out if AI is the right answer. Sometimes it is. Sometimes it's not. Either way, you have a clear picture before a single line of code is written.
about.paragraph4: We've worked on systems where errors are costly: industrial maintenance, regulatory compliance, business-critical applications. This taught us one thing: technology that works is technology that disappears from daily life — no one has to think about it.

practical.title: Direct Approach
practical.description: If AI isn't the answer, we'll tell you

fast.title: AI-First
fast.description: We use AI every day — before recommending it to you

custom.title: Custom-Made
custom.description: We start from your process, not from a template

about.photoAlt: The AI and Beyond - AI Consulting

services.label: Services
services.title: What we
services.description: Every business has processes that work poorly, cost too much, or steal time from the wrong people. We find them and fix them — with AI where it makes sense, with other tools where it doesn't. Sometimes the right combination of existing tools, configured well, changes everything.
services.bridge: These aren't rigid categories. They're the most common starting points. Your project might cross one, or several. And it doesn't always require building something complex: often the biggest value comes from the right tools, put together the right way. We'll figure it out together on the first call.

consulting.title: AI Strategy
consulting.description: A clear map of where AI makes a difference in your processes
consulting.problem: You know AI could help. But you don't know where to start. And every vendor promises revolutions without telling you what actually makes sense for your case.
consulting.outcome: You have a clear map. You know where AI makes a difference in your processes, which tools you need, and which you don't. No blind investments.
consulting.different: We start from the inefficiency you see every day — and verify if AI is the solution or if something else is needed. Even if the answer is "no AI." Building the wrong thing is a waste for everyone.

webdev.title: Custom Development
webdev.description: Tools built around how your team actually works
webdev.problem: Your team works with tools that weren't designed for your workflow. You adapt to the software. Workarounds, parallel spreadsheets, manual steps that exist only because the system won't allow otherwise.
webdev.outcome: You have a tool built around how your team actually works. Manual steps disappear. The workflow is the right one for you.
webdev.different: We don't develop generic software. We start from your process, understand it, and build something that makes it simpler. If a process already works well, we don't intervene.

agents.title: Intelligent Automation
agents.description: AI agents that handle repetitive tasks autonomously
agents.problem: Your team spends hours every week on repetitive tasks. Data entry, email sorting, reports, follow-ups. Necessary activities, but ones that don't require human expertise.
agents.outcome: An AI agent handles these activities autonomously. Your team only intervenes on exceptions — where the system doesn't have enough context to decide on its own. Low-value work disappears from the day.
agents.different: We're not talking about simple auto-reply bots. We're talking about agents that work: they receive emails, classify them, extract data into your management system, respond to clients, and only notify exceptions. They integrate with your tools — CRM, email, management systems — and work even when no one is watching.

prototypes.title: Rapid Validation
prototypes.description: Working MVP in 3-4 weeks to validate your idea
prototypes.problem: You have an idea for a product or process. But investing months of development before knowing if it works is a risk you don't want to take.
prototypes.outcome: In 3-4 weeks you have a working MVP — not polished, but enough to answer the real question. Real feedback from real users. You decide the next step with data, not assumptions.
prototypes.different: We optimize for speed of learning, not quantity of features. A prototype must answer one question: "Does this thing work?" The faster you get to the answer, the less you risk.

pm.title: Operational Optimization
pm.description: AI tools integrated into your workflow to eliminate manual coordination
pm.problem: Coordination steals time you should dedicate to real work. Status updates, resource reallocation, weekly reports — all manual, all repetitive.
pm.outcome: AI tools integrated into your workflow automate coordination. Automatic reports, smart alerts, real-time visibility. Without asking anyone "where are we at?"
pm.different: We don't replace your tools. We make them smarter. We work with what you already use — Notion, Jira, Linear, Asana — and add a layer of automation that eliminates the mechanical part.

portfolio.label: Portfolio
portfolio.title: Completed
portfolio.description: A selection of real projects representing our areas of expertise. Each project stems from a concrete problem, solved with concrete tools.
portfolio.confidentiality: Out of respect for our clients' privacy, identifying details have been omitted. The results and competencies described are real. To discuss your project, get in touch.
portfolio.hint: Click on a project for details

consulting.title: Process Automation: Ad Campaigns & Intelligent Document Management
consulting.problem: A company manually managed the entire ad campaign creation cycle and the filing of invoices and documents received via email. Hours of repetitive work every week, with data scattered across email, folders, and shared drives — with no automated processing.
consulting.solution: Selection of the ideal tool stack and creation of fully automated workflows: from dynamic, animated campaign creation to publication. For document management, an AI system that not only sorts and archives, but processes, cross-references, summarizes, generates charts and automatic analyses from received documents. Every criterion and action defined together with the client.
results: Documents automatically processed, analyzed, and cross-referenced
Instant insights from invoices and documents — charts, summaries, analyses

aiStrategy.title: AI Roadmap for a Manufacturing SME
aiStrategy.problem: A manufacturing SME wanted to understand if and how AI could improve their processes, but lacked internal expertise and a clear vision of intervention priorities.
aiStrategy.solution: Complete audit of business processes and identification of high-impact areas. Definition of a 12-month implementation roadmap with immediate quick wins and medium-term projects. Management training to make the company autonomous in AI decisions.
results: 3 quick wins implemented in the first month
12-month roadmap with estimated ROI per intervention

webdev.title: AI-Powered Web Apps: Conversational Data Analysis & Grant Search
webdev.problem: Manual analysis of complex Excel files without adequate tools — hours lost searching for patterns and generating reports. Meanwhile, searching for grants and funding was scattered across dozens of different portals without intelligent filters.
webdev.solution: Dedicated web app suite: a conversational platform for Excel file analysis — users chat with their data, ask for insights, generate charts and reports via conversation. A grant search application with conversational AI flow that filters by sector, requirements, and user preferences.
results: Complex data analysis from hours to minutes via natural conversation
Grant coverage 10x with one-fifth the effort

aiAgents.title: Custom AI Agents: From Operations to Personnel Selection
aiAgents.problem: A team spent hours every day on repetitive tasks: email sorting, data extraction from documents, CRM updates, client follow-ups. The HR department, in parallel, manually screened hundreds of CVs for each open position.
aiAgents.solution: Suite of custom AI agents trained on the client's business: operational agents integrated with email, CRM, and management software that receive, classify, extract data, and only notify exceptions. AI HR Assistant for automatic CV screening, candidate pre-selection, and recruiting process support.
results: HR team focused on high-value interviews

prototyping.title: Naval Shipyard Management System
prototyping.problem: A naval shipyard managed complex projects with hundreds of activities, timelines, and assignments on Excel spreadsheets and paper procedures. No real-time visibility, no structured coordination between departments.
prototyping.solution: Prototype of a multi-user web management system with ESWBS (Expanded Ship Work Breakdown Structure) classification, work order management, automatic timeline calculation, and reporting. Tablet-friendly interface designed for direct use in the shipyard.

pmLogistics.title: Simplified Maintenance Manual Creation
pmLogistics.problem: Technical maintenance documentation was fragmented across dozens of different sources: supplier manuals, technical sheets, internal notes, operating procedures. Creating a unified manual required weeks of manual work with a high risk of inconsistencies.
pmLogistics.solution: Local AI-powered tool that simplifies the creation of maintenance manuals from multiple documentation sources — without sensitive data ever leaving the client's infrastructure. The user provides instructions and criteria, the AI analyzes sources, identifies relevant information, and generates structured, coherent outputs. No complex product needed: the right combination of AI tools, well orchestrated, turned weeks of work into days. Always under operator supervision and guidance.
results: Manual creation time: from weeks to days
Coherent structure guided by the user

process.label: How We Work
process.title: A transparent
process.description: From the first call to delivery, here's how we work.
process.closingNote: Every project is different. Timelines and phases adapt to the complexity of the problem — not to a template.

listen.title: We Listen
listen.description: First, we understand the context. We talk to those who work, not just those who decide. We map processes, identify bottlenecks, and define objectives together.

analyze.title: We Analyze
analyze.description: We study the data, workflows, and tools already in use. We assess where AI can have real impact and where it can't. Not everything needs artificial intelligence.

design.title: We Design
design.description: We define architecture, tools, timelines and costs. No surprises: you know exactly what will be built and why.

develop.title: We Build
develop.description: We build with agile methodology. Continuous feedback, rapid iterations, zero black-box effect. You see the progress, you test it, you validate it.

deliver.title: We Deliver
deliver.description: Testing, deployment, documentation. We deliver everything that was agreed — working, documented, and ready for your team to use.

contact.label: Contact
contact.description: Have a problem to solve, a process to optimize, or just want to understand if AI can help? Tell us your situation — we'll respond with an analysis, not an automated quote.
contact.informativa: The data you provide will be used exclusively to respond to your request. More information in our
contact.trustNote: Your data is safe. We don't share it with anyone.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.description: Answers to the questions we get asked most often.
faq.cta: Didn't find the answer you were looking for?

ai-fit.question: Is AI right for my business?
ai-fit.answer: It depends. Not on how big your company is, but on where it's losing time or money. If you have repetitive processes tying up skilled people, data no one analyzes, or a team doing avoidable manual work — probably yes. The first step is always a diagnosis: we understand your context, map the inefficiencies, and honestly tell you where AI makes sense and where it doesn't.

timeline.question: How long does an AI project take?
timeline.answer: An MVP or proof-of-concept: 2-4 weeks. More structured projects: 2-3 months. We work in agile — weekly sprints, regular demos, zero black-box effect. You see progress from day one, not after months of silence.

cost.question: How much does an AI consulting project cost?
cost.answer: We don't have a price list — automating email sorting for a 5-person team is different from building an AI-powered management system. Cost depends on what needs to be built and how complex it is. What we always do: free first call to understand the problem, then a clear quote with scope, timeline, and costs — before any code is written.

process.question: How does the work process work?
process.answer: Free introductory call — we understand the problem and context. Analysis and concrete proposal with scope, timeline, and costs. If we go ahead, we work in agile: weekly sprints, demos of what works, continuous feedback. You don't receive a final deliverable after months of silence — you see progress week by week.
